Rule.Name: Alter the Advertised server.info String (Manual)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'server.info' string is not customized, which may expose server information.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Alter the 'server.info' string to a custom value.

Rule.Name: Alter the Advertised server.number String (Manual)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'server.number' string is not customized, which may expose server information.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Alter the 'server.number' string to a custom value.

Rule.Name: Alter the Advertised server.built Date (Manual)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'server.built' date is not customized, which may expose server build information.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Alter the 'server.built' date to a custom value.

Rule.Name: Disable X-Powered-By HTTP Header and Rename the Server Value (Automated)
Rule.Section: Disable X-Powered-By HTTP Header and Rename the Server Value
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The X-Powered-By HTTP header is enabled, which may expose server information.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable the X-Powered-By HTTP header by configuring the server attribute in the Connector.

Rule.Name: Disable client facing Stack Traces (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Client-facing stack traces are enabled, which may expose sensitive information to users.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable client-facing stack traces by defining proper error pages.

Rule.Name: Turn off TRACE (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The HTTP TRACE method is enabled, which may allow cross-site tracing attacks.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Turn off the TRACE method in web.xml.
Rule.Correction: sed -i '/<LimitExcept GET POST HEAD>/!b;n;cDeny from all' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/web.xml
Rule.Verification: grep -A 5 '<LimitExcept GET POST HEAD>' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/web.xml | grep -q 'Deny from all' && echo 0 || echo 1

Rule.Name: Ensure Server Header is Modified To Prevent Information Disclosure (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'Server' header is not modified, which may expose server information to clients.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the 'Server' header is modified to prevent information disclosure.
